price: Kun (Qur’aanni) gorsa barakeeffamaa Nuti buufneedha, Sila isin isaaf mormitootaa?
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
